Articles.Content:
You were just cutting a Mun, i used Telepathy to send a Trimentri to you, causing your head to blow up and created my 500 Megaton Crater, origin of that 500 Megaton crater of yours.

**Edited <time datetime="2019-02-25T04:46:30Z" title="02/25/2019 04:46  AM" data-short="5 yr">February 25, 2019</time> by GRS**

My head: \*Grows back\*

[@GRS](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/179502-grs/): \*that pikachu surprised face meme that’s been popular recently\*

Me: \*Chuckles\* I have put all of this post’s text into theatre script! \*points in the distance at a mountain\* My hill!

You forget that this is king of the hill. You pointed at a mountain not a hill (believe me its a real thing, there is a difference) so I subsequently take the hill in front of it and call it...

My hill

My Hill + Proof

![4plyWn5.png](https://i.imgur.com/4plyWn5.png)

I blow you up.

My hill

I used a nearly indestructible guided missile to hit you.

My Hill.
The indestructible rocket bounces back and hits the hill.

I rain smartbombs on everyone’s hills.

My expanding fireballs.

**Edited <time datetime="2019-03-02T22:56:00Z" title="03/02/2019 10:56  PM" data-short="5 yr">March 2, 2019</time> by Fraston**

I Imploded your Fireball...

My Desert of Nothingness...

I take all the pancakes eaten today and stack them up creating,

My pancakey syrup hill

You get sticked to the hill.

Flypaper Hill.

I burnt your hill with lava to expand...

My desert of Nothingness...
Nothingness claims the desert is hers, not yours.

I created a hill in that desert, Nothingness can't have the Desert if something's there...

My Hill...
A sandstorm hides the hill.

A nuclear warhead goes off in the storm.

My glassstorm.

Alt-F-4 reload.

![uKsTyH7.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/uKsTyH7.jpg)

**Mine.**

![giphy-downsized-large.gif](https://media.giphy.com/media/F0uvYzyr2a7Li/giphy-downsized-large.gif)

![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")

**Edited <time datetime="2019-03-16T06:31:24Z" title="03/16/2019 06:31  AM" data-short="5 yr">March 16, 2019</time> by Triop**

She makes a sweep. You fall down from the platform.

Her ~~hill~~ heel.

The stilettos break. 

A big sharp piece of plastic.

**Edited <time datetime="2019-03-21T23:00:43Z" title="03/21/2019 11:00  PM" data-short="5 yr">March 21, 2019</time> by Fraston**
THE KRAKEN (and the GoT dragon) STRIKES AND DESTROYS EVERYTHING. MY HILL (mwah ahaha)

I’ll just take that hill from you. I see that you clearly want it much less than I do. I open my mouth wide and spit out 4 huge pop culture robots (a Jaeger, a Terminator but at 10x size, Susie’s mech but at 5x size and the scary grand piano from  Mario 64 at 7.5x size) to guard my hill.

My protected hill.

NUB !!!

I summoned the STTGL to effortlessly erase all of those Mechs and create...

My Multi Universe sized Giga Hill Breaker...

**Edited <time datetime="2019-03-22T00:43:33Z" title="03/22/2019 12:43  AM" data-short="5 yr">March 22, 2019</time> by GRS**
While your Giga Hill is having a break, the Multi Universe gets sold.

And i buoght it ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif ":sticktongue:")

My Multi Unviverse sized Hill...

I erase your Multi Universe sized Hill.

Hippity hoppity, your non-existent Multi Universe sized Hill is my property.
